Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasa.context: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

Nasal fracture.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

deviated nasal septum with obstruction.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

16-year-old male.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

fractured his nose.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

left nasal obstruction.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

depressed left nasal bone.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

general endotracheal anesthesia.context: The patient was given general endotracheal anesthesia and monitored with pulse oximetry, EKG, and CO2 monitors.

Afrin pledgets.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

caudal portion of the cartilaginous sept.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

large maxillary crest and supramaxillary.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest. There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

large deep groove horizontally on the ri.context: There was a large deep groove horizontally on the right side corresponding to the left maxillary crest.

left hemitransfixion incision.context: A left hemitransfixion incision was made.

mucoperichondrium was elevated.context: Mucoperichondrium was elevated from left side of the cartilaginous septum and mucoperiosteum was elevated from the ethmoid plate.

vomerine spur.context: Vomer and inferior tunnel was created at the floor of the left side of the nose to connect the anterior and inferior tunnels, which was rather difficult at the area of the vomerine spur, which was very sharp and touching the inferior turbinate.

caudal cartilaginous septum.context: The caudal cartilaginous septum, which was lying crosswise, was separated from the main cartilage leaving approximately 1 cm strut.

deviated septum was corrected.context: Thus, the deviated septum was corrected.

nasal bones were refractured.context: Therefore, the nasal bones were refractured back into the midline by compressing the left nasal bone and elevating the right nasal bone with the nasal bone elevator through the nasal cavities.

Steri-Strips.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Telfa gauze.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

bacitracin ointment.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

blood loss.context: Approximate blood loss was 10 to 20 mL.
